    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3093</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">You are what you eat.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sie sind, was Sie essen.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Êtes vous ce que vous mangez.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Você é o que você come.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Siete che cosa mangiate.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Είστε αυτό που τρώτε.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Usted es lo que usted come.</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An Advanced organiser for teachers planning Unit Plan on the topic of Food around the World, and a webquest activity for students</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">language</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">feelings</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein hochentwickelter Organisator für die Lehrer, die 
Maßeinheit Plan auf dem Thema der Nahrung um die Welt planen, und 
eine webquest Aktivität für Kursteilnehmer</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un organisateur avançé pour des professeurs projetant le
plan d'unité sur le sujet de la nourriture autour du monde, et une 
activité webquest pour des étudiants</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um organiser avançado para os professores que planeiam a 
planta da unidade no tópico do alimento em torno do mundo, e uma 
atividade a mais webquest para estudantes</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un organiser avanzato per gli insegnanti che progettano 
programma dell'unità sul soggetto di alimento intorno al mondo e 
un'attività la più webquest per gli allievi</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας προηγμένος διοργανωτής για το σχέδιο μονάδων 
προγραμματισμού δασκάλων για το θέμα των τροφίμων σε όλο τον 
κόσμο, και μια pjo' ωεψquεστ δραστηριότητα για τους σπουδαστές</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un organizador avanzado para los profesores que planean 
plan de la unidad en el asunto del alimento alrededor del mundo, y una
actividad ma's webquest para los estudiantes</string>
          </description>
